title: Unannounced OnePlus 13R appears on a leaked Geekbench listing
description: Geekbench is at it again, leaking the specs of yet another unannounced smartphone. This time it's the OnePlus 13R, which is expected to be announced alongside the global version of OnePlus 13 early next year. Geekbench 6 result This Geekbench listing, first spotted by MySmartPrice, lists the device with the model number CPH2645. The model tested was running on the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, which is the same chipset found on the OnePlus 12 and a generation newer than the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 found on the OnePlus 12R. The 'pineapple' motherboard name is the same as the OnePlus...
excerpt: Features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset. Geekbench is at it again, leaking the specs of yet another unannounced smartphone. This time it's the OnePlus 13R,...
text: Geekbench is at it again, leaking the specs of yet another unannounced smartphone. This time it's the OnePlus 13R, which is expected to be announced alongside the global version of OnePlus 13 early next year. Geekbench 6 result This Geekbench listing, first spotted by MySmartPrice, lists the device with the model number CPH2645. The model tested was running on the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, which is the same chipset found on the OnePlus 12 and a generation newer than the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 found on the OnePlus 12R. The 'pineapple' motherboard name is the same as the OnePlus 12. The tested device also had 12GB of system memory and was running Android 15, indicating OxygenOS 15 onboard, but that part should be obvious. The device scored on par with the other Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 devices we have tested recently. As with previous generations, the OnePlus 13R will be a cutback version of the OnePlus 13, running slightly older hardware and reduced specs for a lower price. We are nearing the launch of this device and more will be revealed in the coming weeks. Source
html:
Geekbench is at it again, leaking the specs of yet another unannounced smartphone. This time it's the OnePlus 13R, which is expected to be announced alongside the global version of OnePlus 13 early next year.


Geekbench 6 result

This Geekbench listing, first spotted by MySmartPrice, lists the device with the model number CPH2645. The model tested was running on the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, which is the same chipset found on the OnePlus 12 and a generation newer than the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 found on the OnePlus 12R. The 'pineapple' motherboard name is the same as the OnePlus 12.

The tested device also had 12GB of system memory and was running Android 15, indicating OxygenOS 15 onboard, but that part should be obvious. The device scored on par with the other Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 devices we have tested recently.

As with previous generations, the OnePlus 13R will be a cutback version of the OnePlus 13, running slightly older hardware and reduced specs for a lower price. We are nearing the launch of this device and more will be revealed in the coming weeks.

Source
